headline: KLA (KLAC) Valuation Check As AI Chipmakers Rally On Nvidia Earnings Optimism
summary: AI optimism and sector move lifting KLA Today’s rally in AI related chipmakers has KLA (KLAC) trading more than 3% higher, as investors position ahead of Nvidia’s earnings and reassess semiconductor equipment exposure tied to artificial intelligence spending. See our latest analysis for KLA. Beyond today’s move, KLA’s recent share price performance has been strong, with a 90 day share price return of 33.44% and a 1 year total shareholder return of 111.02%, indicating strong momentum around AI...

headline: Investors Boost Semiconductor Spending Forecasts for KLA Corporation (KLAC)
summary: Aristotle Funds, an investment advisor, released its “Growth Equity Fund” fourth-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. U.S. equity markets reached new all-time highs in Q4 2025, with the S&P 500 Index rising 2.66% and the Bloomberg U.S. Aggregate Bond Index increasing by 1.10%.
